_components._string:
- Players will only play one Straight Gin game to decide the winner.
- Winning Coins = Point Value * Winner's Points, so as the losing coins.
- So the coins you can win at most from one game is: 125*point value.
- If you leave the table when the game is not finished, the coins will be deducted as 125*point value.
